Message.Msg: >>Wakeup this stock is being shotred and manipulated to drive you out in order to pickup cheap shares. are you crazy? you really believe this? if it wasn't for the "dumb" mutual fund support from the hundred of thousands of clueless people working real jobs right now, this thing would be $2 a share? it's over. liquidate and distribute the cash to shareholders, before its too late. dell is going to spend the cash on worthless aquisitions in a hope to catch a bolt of lightning. he doesn't care about shareholders one bit -- he has billions already. why do you think this company never paid a dividend until just now? darwins theory fits well here as well as the saying a fool and his money soon part.

Topic.Title: thousands of stocks better than dell

Message.Msg: Yeah Really. Go to the HPQ board. Now there is a winner just for you.
